author: Woo Bih Li J:
casename: Cosmic Insurance Corp Ltd v United Oil Co Pte Ltd
counsel: K Anparasan and Nadia Almenoar (KhattarWong) for the appellant; Michael Eu Hai Meng (ComLaw LLC) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Employment Law/Payment by employer's insurer of hospital expenses incurred in relation to injuries sustained by workman in the course of work/Whether insurer entitled to indemnity for hospital expenses under s 18(b) of Act/Whether hospital expenses amounting to "compensation" within Act/Section 18(b) Workmen's Compensation Act (Cap 354, 1998 Rev Ed)
